body.name: Eco Friendly, Plant Powered Laundry Detergent Strips - Fragrance Free, Unscented, Ultra Concentrated, Earth Friendly No Plastic - Lightweight and Perfect For Home, Dorms, Travel, Camping

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Powered By Coconut Laundry Soap Sheets - Rated first for ingredients—cruelty-free, vegan and free of dye, perfume, parabens, phthalates and more—cleans clothes deep and removes odor, stains and dirt.
Awesome Travel Laundry Sheet - Our compact strips are highly concentrated and will be your new favorite travel detergent. Great for machine wash or hand wash as travel sink detergent.

Carbon Negative, Earth & Animal Friendly - Our sustainable laundry detergent strips are ultra low emission, 20x lighter than liquid detergents. We offset what remains by 2x through The Gold Standard and UNFCC.
Plastic free laundry detergent - Our laundry strips are biodegradable, contain no plastic and produce no microbeads. Each pack comes in 100% recyclable cardboard.
Our Guarantee - We're pretty sure you'll love our eco friendly detergent strips. If for whatever reason you don't, receive a no questions asked refund within 30 days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Zero Waste Laundry Detergent Our detergent strips are packed in simple recyclable cardboard. Great for travel, camping, or your next trek to the laundromat. The Easiest Handwash Ever Simply drop a strip in water and add your clothing. Leave it to soak or wash it right away. Quite simply the easiest cloth handwash ever, and the perfect travel detergent for hand laundering. Cruelty Free & Much More Our strips undergo no animal testing and are cruelty free. That in addition to being vegan, carbon negative, fragrance free, plastic free, dye free and more.

Carbon Negative Our auditors analyzed our complete supply chain, including manufacturing, freight shipping and shipping direct to your door. We then buffered that value by 30% and doubled it to achieve a carbon negative status for every pack of Lazy Coconuts detergent strips. The environment is our #1 priority and we are constantly searching for new ways to become a more environmentally responsible company.

Original formulation Gentle formulation Fragrance free ✓ ✓ Dye free ✓ ✓ Recyclable packaging ✓ ✓ Phthalate free ✓ ✓ Our strongest formulation ✓ Sulfate free ✓ Created for sensitive skin, baby ✓ Plastic free ✓ ✓ Carbon negative ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very effective laundry sheets--unscented but the clothes smell fresh and washed after using. They dissolve completely and are good at getting stains out. The best thing about these is that they don't have starch in them so none of that stickiness you can get with other laundry sheet brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best thing ever!
reviews.reviewText: This is the only laundry detergent I use. since discovering it three years ago. The slim packs are space saving, and they work like a charm. I even toss one in my luggage in case I need to wash something in the hotel sink while traveling. Dissolves quickly and easily. I've never had an issue with clumping. (I do use cold water so that may be a factor. However, the few times a year I do use hot there's never been an issue.) I run large loads of athletic apparel, kid clothes, stained pet blankets, towels, sheets, etc and always use half a strip. Clothes are perfectly clean every time. No weird chemical smells, just clean clothes. I average a load a day so that means I get 1.5 months out of ONE pack. I average a savings of $150 a year in laundry detergent using these. Interesting aside: I once used dryer sheets, but these somehow cuts static cling completely. Which means I save another $60 a year in dryer sheets totaling $210 savings per year using this product. Thats REAL money. I order a full year of these packs at a time. The satisfaction of passing the laundry aisle and not entering, dragging home huge plastic jugs of toxic goo, tossing all that plastic into the garbage.....priceless. I'm such a fan that I set a few aside and gift them to friends. Take the leap, spread the word, this stuff is magic in one, little sheet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy, lightweight, same cleaning power as All Free and Clear
reviews.reviewText: So, this is an item I recommend for anyone trying to reduce plastic consumption, save space, or needing lighter/easier to carry options. I waited to make my judgment until I’d been using it for a couple months. They work the same as my All Free and Clear (also unscented) detergent that I’ve been using for ... a decade? 🤔 There is no scent at all to this that I can pick up on. I’ve noticed no difference in cleaning power. I’m also not generally rolling in mud, so I’m not sure what would happen with big time stains, but I frequently spill or get grease splatter while cooking on my shirts that I pretreat (usually with dish soap) and have had no issues with stains not coming out in the first wash. It’s essentially double the price per load of those big, heavy jugs of laundry detergent, so it might not be feasible cost-wise for everyone right now. However, it comes in super small, light packaging made of paper/cardboard, so it’s easier to recycle. 👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This laundry soap works great
reviews.reviewText: I will buy this laundry soap again. It’s eco-friendly, non-irritating, and cleans well in a tiny sheet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered this a number of times. It cleans our clothes well, is unscented and doesn't appear to put any plastic into the environment. I will continue to use this well into the future. We also take this in an envelope when we travel to hand-wash items as we go. Lightweight and easy to pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really convenient and easy to pack
reviews.reviewText: I took these on a trip to wash my clothes and it was quite easy to use and effective. The strip doesn't just give off the detergent and then stay there, it dissolves completely. As long as it's dry it's a solid, get it wet and it turns into detergent. Easy to use and very useful. Great item for handwashing and I think for a machine as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling!
reviews.reviewText: I took these on an extended trip through Europe. Easy to use in the sink. I cut them into smaller strips and placed in a zip bag. I only ended up using a few but they worked really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best eco friendly choice
reviews.reviewText: I spent about a month researching every eco friendly advertised laundry detergent I could find. I did price comparisons using unscented Tide as my baseline, looked into 3rd party testing and certifications, and compared reviews. After all of that, on paper these were the winner, and in practice they exceeded my expectations. 100% recommend
